a.span:
ASFA is the only tuition-free
magnet school for the arts and
sciences serving the entire state.

Dormitory space is available so
students from across the state
can attend ASFA.

ASFA provides core academics and
specialty instruction to earn an
advanced high school diploma.

Students spend 3+ hours a day
in the specialty area they are
passionate about.

a.div:
Professional Performances
Composing & Songwriting
History & Theory

RPM Certified Curriculum
Partnering & Repertoire
Choreography Seminar

Printmaking & Drawing
Sculpture & Painting
Art History

Writing Workshops
Literary Anthology
Elements of Narrative

Acting & Directing
Stage Management
Costuming & Set Design

Research Based
AP Level Coursework
Computer Science

a.h2: Be a Vital Part of the Performance

div.p: Our faculty members have reached #1 on the Billboard Soft Jazz chart, danced internationally with New York’s American Ballet Theatre, been recognized nationally for inspiring others, and have permanent art installations in major galleries throughout the country.
